name: Pacific Hills Treatment Centers, INC.
overview: Pacific Hills Treatment Centers are the preferred Christian drug and alcohol treatment center in the nation. Our centers have been featured on the A&E as well as Larry King Live. We have been providing quality addiction treatment for almost two decades focusing on dual-diagnosis and the spiritual aspects to treatment. Our staff consists of master level therapist, licensed counselors, psychologists, psychiatrists, and pastors. We also provide a traditional approach to addiction treatment. Give us a call and we will help you get started.
